solution.text:
Curved surface area of the tent\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k*j),2)}}_\)sq.cm
Cost of \(1cm^2\) of canvas\(=\)Rs.\(_{l}_\)
Therefore, cost of canvas\(=\)Curves surface area \(\times\) cost
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k*j),2)}}_ \times _{l}_\)
\(=\)Rs.\(\,_{{trunc((pi_val*k*j*l),2)}}_\)

content.text: Cost of canvas if \(1cm^2\) of canvas is Rs.\(_{l}_\)?
